title: How to Check Recently Watched on TikTok: Watch History

steps.title: Open the TikTok app and tap Profile.
steps.content: Open the TikTok app and tap Profile . This person-shaped icon will be at the bottom-right corner of TikTok . This takes you to your profile . If you haven't updated TikTok in a while, you may need to do so before you can find your watch history. You can easily update the app on your iPhone or Android through the App Store or Play Store.

steps.title: Tap the three-line menu ☰.
steps.content: Tap the three-line menu ☰ . You'll see it at the top-right corner of your profile.

steps.title: Tap Settings and privacy.
steps.content: Tap Settings and privacy . It's at the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Tap Activity center.
steps.content: Tap Activity center . This is in the "Content & Display" section of your settings.

steps.title: Tap Watch history.
steps.content: Tap Watch history . You'll see it in the “Content & Activity” section near the middle of the page.

steps.title: Find your recently watched videos at the top of your watched history.
steps.content: Find your recently watched videos at the top of your watched history. Now you'll see all of the videos you've watched over the past 180 days, with the most recent TikToks you've watched at the top of the list. Your TikTok watch history can take up a lot of space on your phone or tablet. To free up some space, you can clear your watch history by tapping Select at the top, choosing Select all watch history , and then tapping Delete . It's no longer possible to turn off your watch history completely.
